org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene

Class NRTCommitPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.AbstractCommitPolicy
      • org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.NRTCommitPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommitPolicy

    public final class NRTCommitPolicy
extends AbstractCommitPolicy
    Commit policy for Near Real Time usage of a indexWriter. Will only commit if explicitly requested
    Author:
    gustavonalle
